project_abstract.cdata: The Rubber Development Project consists of the new planting and replanting of 40,000 ha of rubber, of which 36,000 ha would be on state farms and 4,000 ha on nearby communes. It would provide for the planting of windbreaks in typhoon-prone areas and intercropping in immature rubber. It would also include modernization of machinery and transport fleets on state farms, construction or upgrading of sawmills and timber utilization facilities, construction of housing, administrative and service buildings and the construction or upgrading of road links within state farms. Technical assistance would be provided for training and for consultant services (26-man-months) in estate management, wood processing, and rubber and windbreak development.

P003419.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>橡胶发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的内容包括增种和改种4万公顷橡胶树，其中国营农场种植面积为3.6万公顷，农场附近地区种植面积为4000公顷。项目将资助以下活动：（1）在台风高发地区营造防风林，在橡胶幼树中进行间种；（2）对国营林场的机械和运输车辆进行现代化改造；（3）新建或改造锯木厂和木材加工设施；（4）建设住房、行政办公和服务大楼；（5）修建或改造国营林场内的连接道路。项目将就房产管理、木材加工以及橡胶林和防风林建设等方面的培训和咨询服务（26个人月）提供技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
